original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (6)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya

original: 12.20. Saraṇaduka, Dassanenapahātabbadukādi
analyzed: saraṇa duka dassanena apahātabba duka ādi

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nanadassanena pahātabbaṁ
analyzed: na saraṇam na dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na na dassanena pahātabba

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇa

original: nanabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ
analyzed: na na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na dassanena pahātabba hetuka

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nanadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam nana dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca pe

original: nasaraṇaṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca,
analyzed: na saraṇam na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca

original: ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nanabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na saraṇam na na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nasavitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ naavitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na saraṇam na sa vitakkam dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na a vitakkam dhammam paṭicca

original: …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nasavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe
analyzed: pe na saraṇam na sa vicāram dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe

original: ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: ekam pe a vigate tīṇi

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: na saraṇam na avicāram dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate dve

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nasappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ naappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na saraṇam na sappītikam dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na appītikam dhammam paṭicca

original: …pe… nasaraṇaṁ napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nanapītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: pe na saraṇam na pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na na pīti sahagatam dhamma

original: paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nanasukhasahagataṁ
analyzed: paṭicca pe na saraṇam na sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na na sukha sahagata

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na aupekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nanaupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: na saraṇam na na aupekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate dve

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nakāmāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na saraṇam na kāmāvacaram dhammam paṭicca

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nanakāmāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na saraṇam na na kāmāvacaram dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Nasaraṇaṁ narūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nanarūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na saraṇam na rūpāvacaram dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na na rūpāvacaram dhammam paṭicca

original: …pe… nasaraṇaṁ naarūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe
analyzed: pe na saraṇam na arūpāvacaram dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe

original: dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nanaarūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na saraṇam na na a rūpa avacaram dhammam paṭicca

original: Nasaraṇaṁ napariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na saraṇam na pariyāpannam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naapariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na saraṇam na apariyāpannam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na saraṇam na niyyānikam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naaniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na saraṇam na aniyyānikam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na saraṇam na niyatam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na saraṇam na aniyatam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nasauttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na saraṇam na sauttaram dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na sauttaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naanuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na saraṇam na anuttaram dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na anuttaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naaraṇaṁ naanuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na araṇam na anuttaram dhammam paṭicca na araṇaḥ na anuttaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naaraṇaṁ naanuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na araṇam na anuttaram dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na anuttaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naaraṇaṁ naanuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanuttaro ca naaraṇo naanuttaro ca
analyzed: na araṇam na anuttaram dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na anuttaraḥ ca na araṇaḥ na anuttaraḥ ca

original: dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naanuttarañca naaraṇaṁ naanuttarañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na saraṇam na anuttaram ca na araṇam na anuttaram ca dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na anuttaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca sabbattha vitthāro

original: Sahajātavārampi paccayavārampi nissayavārampi saṁsaṭṭhavārampi sampayuttavārampi
analyzed: sahajāta vārampi paccaya vārampi nissaya vārampi sa saṭṭha vārampi sampayutta vārampi

original: pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: pañhā vāram pi

original: Dhammapaccanīye dukadukapaṭṭhānaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
analyzed: dhamma paccanīye duka duka paṭṭhānam niṭṭhita

original: Paccanīyapaṭṭhānaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
